ctx: intros A x y v dom₁ dom₂ m₁ m₂ Hxy Hm.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros A x y v dom₁ dom₂ m₁ m₂ Hxy Hm.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros A x y v dom₁ dom₂ m₁ m₂ Hxy Hm. unfold add. unfold eq in Hm. unfold eq. intros z. destruct (X.eq_dec z x) as [Heqzx | Hneqzx]. + rewrite Heqzx. destruct (X.eq_dec x y) as [Heqxy | Hneqxy]. * subst y. rewrite (eq_trans _ _ _ _ _ m₁); auto. * rewrite (S.add_other _ x y v). -- rewrite (S.add_same A y v m₂). auto. -- intros H; apply Hneqxy, X.eq_sym; auto. + rewrite (S.add_other _ z x v). * destruct (X.eq_dec z y) as [Heqzy | Hneqzy]. -- subst z. rewrite (S.add_same A y v m₂). auto. --
